member.name: T:Jellyfin.Server.Migrations.Routines.CreateUserLoggingConfigFile
member.summary: Migration to initialize the user logging configuration file "logging.user.json". If the deprecated logging.json file exists and has a custom config, it will be used as logging.user.json, otherwise a blank file will be created.

member.name: F:Jellyfin.Server.Migrations.Routines.CreateUserLoggingConfigFile._defaultConfigHistory
member.summary: File history for logging.json as existed during this migration creation. The contents for each has been minified.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Server.Migrations.Routines.CreateUserLoggingConfigFile.ExistingConfigUnmodified(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the existing logging.json file has not been modified by the user by comparing it to all the versions in our git history. Until now, the file has never been migrated after first creation so users could have any version from the git history.
member.exception: does not exist or could not be read.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Server.Migrations.Routines.DisableTranscodingThrottling
member.summary: Disable transcode throttling for all installations since it is currently broken for certain video formats.
